Key Match Events: India vs Sri Lanka, 1st ODI, Highlights: Match ends in tie, India ALL OUT; fail to score 1 run
Wanindu Hasaranga and Charith Asalanka took three wickets each for Sri Lanka
Dunith Wellalage took two wickets for Sri Lanka
Asitha Fernando and Akila Dananjaya clinched one wicket each for Sri Lanka
Dunith Wellalage scored an unbeaten 67 off 65 balls for Sri Lanka
Prathum Nissanka scored 56 off 75 balls for Sri Lanka
Arshdeep Singh and Axar Patel took two wickets each for India
Mohammed Siraj, Shivam Dube, Kuldeep Yadav, and Washington Sundar picked one wicket each for India
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka skipper Charith Asalanka won the toss and opted to bat first at the R Premadasa stadium in Colombo
Indian skipper Rohit Sharma said that it looked like a good surface and he was fine with batting second here
The Men in Blue had completely dominated the T20I leg of the series, winning all the 3 matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second ODI will take place on Sunday from the same stadium in Colombo
